extendedInfo.description: A Smart and high-speed browser designed for one hand operation on mobile devices. Easy to use, gesture driven, and one hand optimized. Supports Android 4.0+ Tablet PC and Android 2.3+ Smart phone. The only browser on Playstore designed purely for one hand optimization in mind with all the features that can improve how you interact with web pages with just one hand!--Features1. Eight new unique features highlighta) Tabs Overview.b) Close all opened pages by one key.c) Smart crop.d) Quick controls.e) Find on page.f) Custom quick access.g) Recommend Web sites (History, Most visited, Recommend)h) Import bookmark by one key.2. Seven Gestures Shortcut Control Functionsï¼a) Ocean Fishing (Only available on Tablet): Manage multiple bookmark items by just drawing a circle with one finger on screen to select all items within the circle drawn. b) Quick Controls Mode: Three fingers swipe up on browser web page to turn on âQuick controlsâ mode.Three fingers swipe down to Turn off âQuick controlsâ mode when âQuick controlsâ mode is on.c) Tabs Overview Mode (Only available on Tablet):Three fingers pinch in on browser web page to turn on âTabs Overviewâ.d) Smart Crop Mode:Two fingers long press when browsing web page to activate âSmart cropâ mode.e) Edit Bookmark (Only available on Tablet):One finger long press on bookmark or Tabs Overview page to turn on multiple selection modes.One finger long press on selected bookmarks or folders in multiple selection modes to move all selected bookmarks and folders.f) One Hand Quick Navigation:Three fingers  (One finger for Smart Phone ver.) swipe from right to left to navigate to Next Page.Three fingers  (One finger for Smart Phone ver.) swipe from left to right to navigate to Previous Page.One finger long press on âBackâ button to launch History. (Only available on Tablet)g) One Hand Zoom In/Out page(Only available on Smart Phone )Double tab followed by swiping up with one finger to Zoom in.Double tab followed by swiping up with one finger to Zoom out.

reviews.title: High speed browser in the world
reviews.comment: I downloaded firefox ucbrowser dolphin chrome easybrowser onebrowser but not getting download speed and im searching for a high speed browser till now i find it this is a excllnt browser for android now iam so happy because of this browser thanks a lot to them .... Keep it up but i tried to download ocean brwsr new update but its telling an error eqrd
reviews.author: Majid cp

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Like it
reviews.author: panchara punalur

reviews.title: The old version was better
reviews.comment: Please bring back the close window option in the thumb menu. Also the new look is terrible. It looks clunky and like a child\'s toy. You all are better than that!
reviews.author: David Iman II

reviews.title: I used to love this Browser.
reviews.comment: Now it just looks tacky. Please allow a \"classic skin\" mode. It still functions well but now I feel like I\'m using a kids toy. Does anyone have the old apk file?
reviews.author: Stephen Halleck

reviews.title: Would be my favorite but...
reviews.comment: This is the fastest browser I tried yet constantly crashes, latest update seems a little helped but the problem still exist .Please fix it I would then  call it the best browser.I am on Nexus 7
reviews.author: ania mila

reviews.title: Fall from grace
reviews.comment: The latest update killed the utility of the quick controls as the bookmarks shortcut was replaced by a add bookmarks shortcut. Very illogical
reviews.author: chris chan

reviews.title: Fastest Browser
reviews.comment: I have tried many browser, Dolphin, Boat, Chrome, Firefox and this is by far the best one.  The skin does not bother me.  Having large hands, it is easy for me to \"x\" out of a tab.  Have issues with Chrome.  So far closest browser I have found do desktop/laptop experience on a tablet.  Have only played around with it for a little while, but very impressed.
reviews.author: Everette Henry

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: very handy.  I like the one hand idea so much
reviews.author: Jerry Fan

reviews.comment: OK don\'t know what happened today to my browser but all the folders I created are screwed up. None of my categories are there anymore, one of the sub folders... they\'re all like links to cars that I looked at days ago on car guru.com. what the hell happened? Please fix.
reviews.author: Kel Ertl

reviews.title: Axe \"request desktop site\" give us User Agent
reviews.comment: Extremely frustrating having a nexus 10 being treated like a 4\" phone. I know you can set UAstring via about:debug  then going into settings/debug,  but the app seems to ignore it. Websites like Wikipedia still go to the mobile version because \"request desktop site\" is off by default when you navigate to a domain for first time in session. STOP telling the websites what my platform is if I wish to use another!
reviews.author: Ren Stimpy

reviews.comment: Best and fastest Android tablet browser on the market by now. Wish they have for phone as well. :-(
reviews.author: Yau Ben

reviews.title: App great, theme terrible.
reviews.comment: The app itself is fantastic, very fast and fluid, great performance. The theme though is terrible, it is going the completely wrong way in the looks department. Holo is the way to go looks wise, really hope they improve the look of the app.
reviews.author: Dan Owen

reviews.title: ZUH?!
reviews.comment: What in the Sam hell did you do to this browser!? It looks like a jumpsuit Elton john would\'ve worn in the 70\'s. This was the only browser that supported flash and didn\'t suck on my n10. Ugh.
reviews.author: Adam D

reviews.title: Don\'t update!
reviews.comment: Rubbish since the update. Skin looks tacky. What made this browser great was the aosp look and feel. Also miss the option to set a homepage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Very poor interface. Is it legal for mentally ill people? Change your interface. Bet on stock ICS 4.0.4 browser interface. Add his viewport settings by default. In other words, develop ICS 4.0 browser, since it was the last browser default AndroidOS. In many ways, it is ten times better than Chrome.

reviews.title: Great browser, fast, smooth
reviews.comment: This is the best browser I have used, and I have tried all available on my Nexus 10.  text sizing, page-fit-to-screen, re-arrange speed dial (quick access) icons, three finger swipe for full screen are just a few of the great features of this browser.  Oh yeah, it has flashplayer integration and it works on Android 4.2.2.  Give it a try and take a few minutes to get used to its features.
reviews.author: Neal Haslam

reviews.title: Nice browser
reviews.comment: Really nice, fast browser. One of the fastest and smoothest I\'ve tested.  I would really like to see an option to change the skin as the turquoise can be a bit overbearing.
reviews.author: marc sheridan

reviews.title: I Agree, Don\'t Update!!
reviews.comment: For me, this use to be the best browser out there for android, not anymore, not since the update!!  I wish I would have read the reviews before I updated, I wouldn\'t be looking for another browser to use that supports flash!  I hate chrome, it doesn\'t support flash, even if it did, I probably wouldn\'t use it.  It\'s too bad compal had to mess this up, another person said this too, they force us to use their chinese sites and other garbage! If there is a way to delete/remove them, I sure as heck can\'t find it. You delete/remove other things, you would think they\'d have it so you can delete/remove anything you don\'t want, like it was before and like most, if not all other browsers.  I, for one, will be uninstalling the entire browser now that the update messed it up so bad it\'s not worth the space it\'s taking up on my tablet! What a shame....
reviews.author: River Rat

reviews.title: Remove the childish interface
reviews.comment: The web browser works but the interface looks like it was designed for children. Please localise the bookmarks too.
reviews.author: Richard Sequeira

reviews.title: ACER Iconia Tab A500
reviews.comment: Often crashes on my tab
reviews.author: A Google User
